page.title: 12Tourism 2
page.content: {Self Catering Accommodation_}There are caravan sites in the area with static and touring vans.{Ocean Cove Caravan {Site}and {Bossiney Caravan Site}have static vans which remain on the site all the year.{Headland Caravan Site } caters for tourist vans .Other self catering accommodation consists of flats and holiday bungalows. Rumour has it that {Tintagel Castle} was King Arthur's Castle.Although this is widely beleived to be false the legend still has a certain romantic attraction.A dig is about to begin on the site which is expected to reveal exciting new facts about an early settlement.The castle draws many visitors to {Tintagel}each year.
